title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidGraphs, paths and circuits, trees and fundamental circuits, cut-sets and cut-vertices, planar and dual graphs, colouring, covering and partitioning, direct graphs, enumeration of graphs, graph theoretic algorithms and applications.
